Subject: The Sharepoint Collections are locking our database
Description:
The Sharepoint Collections are locking our database to the point that on Thursday mornings we can’t even get the Network Enterprise Auditor Console to open.  It’s been setting on this screen for 45 minutes:
The Job Locking the database is “SP_StaleUsers”.. it ran for 5 hours and 33 minutes and I believe locked the database the entire time.
 


 

It happened last week too, but I didn’t find it until late Thursday and I had to bounce the server to get StealthAudit reset.   This job should not be preventing any other StealthAudit Activity, something’s broke and they should add fixing this a part of the upcoming Sprint.
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom:
NEA is encountering deadlocks and table blocks when attempting to complete SharePoint collection or reports

Cause:
Multiple SharePoint jobs were running simultaneously and attempting to act on a table at the same time.

Resolution:
assess the runtimes of each job/group and adjust the start time of give jobs to avoid conflicts.
